normalised: Social Media and Influencer Marketing Buzz: Are Your Followers Real, Yaar?

unnormalised: **Social Media & Influencer Marketing Buzz: Are Your Followers Real, Yaar?**
normalised: Are you, like Rohan from Delhi, obsessively checking your follower count? Well, hold on! New follower analytics tools are the talk of the town, and they are not just about vanity metrics anymore.

unnormalised: Are you, like Rohan from Delhi, obsessively checking your follower count? Well, hold on! New follower analytics tools are the talk of the town, and they're not just about vanity metrics anymore.
normalised: These tools are finally cracking down on fake followers. Imagine finding out that half your audience is bots from Bangalore! Ouch.

unnormalised: These tools are finally cracking down on fake followers. Imagine finding out that half your audience is bots from Bangalore! *Ouch*.
normalised: Think of it like checking if the biryani you ordered from Zomato has real meat or just soy chunks. Deep, right?

unnormalised: Think of it like checking if the biryani you ordered from Zomato has real meat or just soy chunks. Deep, right?
normalised: Platforms like SocialPilot and Analisa.io are getting a lot of love. They help you see beyond the numbers and understand engagement, demographics, and even sentiment analysis - basically, kiya chahte hain yeh log?

unnormalised: Platforms like SocialPilot and Analisa.io are getting a lot of love. They help you see beyond the numbers and understand engagement, demographics, and even sentiment analysis - basically, *kiya chahte hain yeh log?*
normalised: Expect a shift in how brands in Mumbai approach influencer marketing. Gone are the days of simply paying based on follower count. R O I, baby!

unnormalised: Expect a shift in how brands in Mumbai approach influencer marketing. Gone are the days of simply paying based on follower count. ROI, baby!
normalised: This Onam season, treat yourself to real connections, not just fake profiles. So, dig into those analytics and build an authentic community. After all, a genuine one thousand is better than a fake one hundred thousand, right?

unnormalised: This Onam season, treat yourself to *real* connections, not just fake profiles. So, dig into those analytics and build an authentic community. After all, a genuine 1000 is better than a fake 100k, right?
